text: Mu by’ukuri, abemeramana nyabo ni babandi bemeye Allah n’Intumwa ye (Muhamadi). Kandi igihe bari kumwe na yo mu gikorwa kibahuza, ntaho bajya batabanje kuyisaba uruhushya. Mu by’ukuri, abo bagusaba uruhushya ni bo bemera Allah n’Intumwa ye (by’ukuri). Bityo, nibaramuka bagusabye uruhushya ku bw’impamvu zabo bwite, ujye uruha uwo ushatse muri bo kandi unabasabire Allah imbabazi. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimbabazi
